title: Redline
description:
1.	Introduction

Redline is heavily armed gang conflict in the not too distant future.  You are an aspiring member of the Company, the hottest gang on the BattleWheels competition circuit but starving for new talent.  Fight in brutal arena combat to win the respect of your fellow Company members, and defend their interests in the harsh world of the Outside to win their trust.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2.	System Requirements

	Pentium II or K6-2 w/ 64megs of RAM
3D Acceleration Card w/ 8megs
